value.title: Bringing Paginated into Power BI reports - INSANE AMAZING!

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
